Function archimedesSpiralX(const double&, const double&, const double&, const double&)¶

  • Defined in File Landscape.h

Function Documentation¶

unsigned long archimedesSpiralX(const double &centre_x, const double &centre_y, const double &radius, const double &theta)

Gets the x coordinate of the archimedes spiral.

Parameters
  • centre_x: the x coordinate of the spiral centre
  • centre_y: the y coordinate of the spiral centre
  • radius: the radius of the spiral
  • theta: the theta of rotation of the spiral
